summary: Worldgen settings are not validated and can cause crashes
Opacity of the new Minecraft logo when fading in the main menu is inconsistent with other elements
Old Minecraft logo in the end poem/credits
[Crash] java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Some villages cause crashes
Redstone dust can be toggled between cross and dot in adventure mode
Structures generated in previous versions are not recognised as valid structures, causing mobs not to spawn
[Crash] "java.lang.NullPointerException: mouseClicked event handler" - Some Superflat presets crash immediately when trying to generate them
Only one piglin can ride on a boat while the other piglin dismounts the boat
Piglins riding on hoglins or other piglins automatically dismount them
Piglins riding on other entities float
Text renders in the wrong order
End Gateways don't generate after defeating the ender dragon
Zombie villager converted from villager gets PersistenceRequired depending on whether attacking zombie had it
"Bee Our Guest" advancement does not trigger when harvesting honey from bee nests
Stronghold end portal can be overwritten by ocean ruins
Enchantment glint doesn't render in boat interior
Text on signs stops rendering while still in view
Piglins crash game when reloaded if a block tag called within the piglin_repellents tag cannot be read
Basalt pillars end above the lava in Java Edition but inside of the lava in Bedrock Edition
Throwing ender pearl whilst mounted doesn't teleport you
Horse armour stops rendering if you equip the horse with a saddle by right-clicking
Compasses and clocks work like normal in villager trading GUI
Parity issue: Piglins do not have a dancing animation when celebrating their victory
Entities sometimes do not render behind the wither armor effect of the Wither
Northwest bias in bee movement
When replacing a snow layer with a grass block, podzol or mycelium, the block has the "snowy=true" blockstate
Ctrl + Pick Block no longer copies skull / head NBT data properly
When a piglin picks up a shield the gear equip sound is infinitely spammed
Right-to-left text is displayed left-to-right at all times
Fire does not spread from netherack to other blocks
Observer not updating when tree grows leaves in front of it
Farmer villagers' farming behavior is broken
2x2 trees sometimes fail to grow, but if they grow, they always grow on the surface
Fire stops ticking forever if gamerule doFireTick is set to false once
Jigsaw blocks do not disappear post-gen when structure is spawned using the 'Generate' action from an initial jigsaw
Projectile protection has no effect on wither skulls, unlike ghast fireballs
Endermen don't avoid the wither's skull projectiles
Fossils can generate inside of desert temples
Player can occasionally be forced into crawling in one block tall spaces
Giant fungi can replace waterlogged blocks when growing
Blackstone can’t be used to repair stone tools and weapons using an anvil
Soul campfire doesn’t deal twice the amount of damage as normal campfire
Spruce generation is broken
Piglin and Zombified Piglin right arm/leg/loincloth textures are identical to the left ones
Ticking entity  java.lang.IllegalStateException: Tag minecraft:fire used before it was bound
Taking product out of stonecutter produces no subtitle
Frost Walker protects player from fire
Basalt randomly gets cut off
Glowstone in the offhand sets spawn point and charges respawn anchor at the same time
If a player is riding a strider, other players can not see the animation of the strider
Piglins don't drop their inventories when converted to zombified piglins
Held items are rendered in front of the world border
Some entities behind the world border are rendered in front of it instead of behind it
Right-to-left text appears left-to-right after game start until language is changed
Shroomlights, wart blocks and vines can overwrite the stem of large Nether fungi
Arrows are rendered in front of the world border
Mushrooms or Nether fungi can replace the stem of large nether fungi (trees)
Nether fossil stops basalt pillar
Nether Fossil support islands are sometimes cut off at chunk borders
Desync when mounting an entity while sneaking
Zombified Piglin does not hold its arms upwards like a zombie
Redstone wire doesn't update connections going up or down when being placed by commands
Fossils can overwrite the stronghold end portal
Hoglins immediately attack invisible players
/clear removes all items from crafting grid regardless of item type
Nylium is not dropping netherrack when it is broken by pickaxe
Items are invisible while being picked up
The /clear command output doesn't count items in the inventory crafting grid
Basalt can generate inside Nether fortresses
Zombie Reinforcements can spawn in regardless if light level is higher than 9 in nether (hard difficulty)
Bells cannot be hung from certain blocks that have a wide enough base
Held items do not render behind semi-transparent entities
Chests do not render behind experience orbs
Fishing line disappears when in front of entities and block entites
Entities sometimes do not render behind semi-transparent entities
Structure block outline renders behind clouds and translucent blocks
Some special rendering blocks render in front of entity hitboxes
Entity hitboxes are rendered behind item frames
Fishing lines render behind water, other transparent blocks, and clouds
Entity hitboxes render behind all translucent blocks and clouds
Block outlines/hitboxes render behind all translucent blocks and clouds
Mobs do not render behind experience orbs
Items do not render behind experience orbs
Bees inside a nest/hive don't grow up or get their breeding timer reset
Items do not render behind transparent blocks while being picked up
Transparent blocks do not render behind experience orbs
Shadows do not render behind experience orbs
Some transparent items make transparent blocks and beacon beams not render behind them when dropped (again)
Clouds, transparent blocks, and other semi-transparent textures do not render behind semi-transparent entities
Arm swing animation is still played when drinking an item
"Skilled" villagers without job site do not get precedence over unemployed villagers
Transparent falling blocks make entities and block entities invisible
Clouds do not render behind moving transparent blocks
Moving transparent blocks cause transparent blocks behind them to not render
Hand animation sometimes plays for a second time with high ping
Food does not drop from a campfire when it is put out with a shovel/water bottle
Rain and snow cannot be seen through transparent blocks
Clouds do not render behind transparent particles
World border is rendered behind clouds
World border is rendered behind transparent blocks
Particles do not render underwater, behind water or behind other transparent blocks
Clouds do not render behind transparent blocks
Player position is constantly reset when clicking with a sword or a trident onto the ground in creative mode
Villagers wake up and seek a new "home" (bed) while living in a 2 high house
Villagers level from Apprentice to Journeyman with less experience than shown by XP bar
Some chest loot is randomized across the same seed, unlike before 1.14
Zombie Reinforcements can spawn on glass
Multiple villagers are attached to the same profession block
Fox spawners do not render the fox inside of the block
Redstone dust block states don't update properly if the wire is broken by a piston
Hoe doesn't lose durability if used to mine blocks
A passenger of a boat is not saved if the passenger is in a different chunk than the boat
All short mobs drown just below the surface of water
Comparators on slabs drop when loading them with structure blocks
Endermen holding a block can despawn
Villager trade with same items but different NBT data
Pig rotation is wrong when you see a player riding them with carrot on a stick
Removal of Log4J2Plugins.dat causing a slowdown of 3 secs on startup while it has to rescan all classes
Intersecting dungeons: spawner replaced by cobblestone
Messages/commands sent while in a bed won't be remembered in sent history
Lily pads can be placed intersecting entities
